description: In our roomy Classic Fit, these cargo shorts are made from durable cotton ripstop and finished with a signature label at the back.
fitting_details: Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
All Big sizes have a 10¼" inseam. Size 40W has a 11¾" rise.
All Tall sizes have an 11¼" inseam. Size 46W has a 13¼" rise.
Belt loops. Side adjusters. Zip fly with a signature buttoned closure.
Two front angled pockets. Cargo pocket at each thigh. Two back snapped pockets.
"Utility Polo RL" label above the back right pocket.
product: Classic Fit Camo Ripstop Cargo Short
